title: Looking to buy some portraits....show me some!
author: njdunkin1

posts.post_title: Looking to buy some portraits....show me some!
posts.post_content:
Hey everyone! NJ here. My new goal for collecting is to aim high and begin collecting portraits from the T206 set. Looking for good front eye appeal, that's about it. Any back will do. Mostly looking for cards with good color. Any for sale?

Already have:
Titus
C. Smith

Thank you!
